name: Clickmazes BoxUp
summary:
Your goal sounds easy, just push the small red box inside the large blue box. Of course, it's not as easy as it sounds.
This is the genuine BoxUp puzzle game, as featured at clickmazes.com, now developed for iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch, by the original BoxUp inventors. The puzzle set includes over 100 brand-new puzzle challenges, with many unique and novel features.
